status.description:
* SSH to the [Puppet VM](@@{Puppet_Service.address}@@) 
* Puppet `puppet help` command line

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.name: action_start

action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
sudo systemctl disable firewalld
sudo systemctl stop firewalld
sudo timedatectl set-timezone 
sudo yum -y install ntp
sudo systemctl restart ntpd
sudo systemctl enable ntpd
sudo rpm -Uvh https://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppet5/puppet5-release-el-7.noarch.rpm
gpg --yes --keyserver pgp.mit.edu --recv-key 7F438280EF8D349F
gpg --yes --list-key --fingerprint 7F438280EF8D349F
sudo yum install -y puppetserver
#!/bin/bash

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

status.name: Puppet Open Source

spec.description:
* SSH to the [Puppet VM](@@{Puppet_Service.address}@@) 
* Puppet `puppet help` command line

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config

  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
